alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 02 at 5:40AM MST until February 03 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, Orofino, Greer Grade, Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins, and White Bird Grade. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 8 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region
